name: Shruti

projects.title: Envoy clone
projects.description: Envoy is a website which a one stop solution for efficiently collaboratng in hybrid workplace.This project is a clone of envoy.com. The learnings of HTML, CSS, javascript along with the use of local Storage can be seen here..

projects.title: Netflix clone
projects.description: A clone of one of the most trending website of all time. This project demonstrates the use of basics of HTML, CSS along with the use of advance Javascript. The appliation of rest API can be also seen.

projects.title: Ajio Clone
projects.description: Online shopping ecommerce website made with react.js. Chakra UI has been used to make user interactive interface

aboutpara: A Solution-driven web developer adept at contributing to highly collaborative work environment and finding solutions. Having experience developing consumer-focused websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Currently based in Bangalore.
